definition: to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: Now, most of us are probably too heavy on the stock side of the equation.
sentences.chinese: 如今，我們大部分人的投資或許都過於偏重股票。

sentences.english: At work, half of the evaluated players use both hands and the other half utilize the right hand.
sentences.chinese: 然工作之慣用手則是偏重於雙手及右手。

sentences.english: A bias toward functional testing also underemphasizes configuration testing.
sentences.chinese: 偏重於功能測試也會低估配置測試的重要性。

sentences.english: Features and the embedded "lies in the different records."
sentences.chinese: 特點就在於和《三字經》各有偏重。

sentences.english: This chapter emphasizes the inspection of international factoring in practice.
sentences.chinese: 本部分偏重於對國際保理實踐情況的考察。

sentences.english: The general well-off level is one that emphasizes material consumption.
sentences.chinese: 總體上的小康是一個偏重於物質消費的小康。

sentences.english: Promoting the brand is a lord still over-emphasize to expand the product?
sentences.chinese: 提升品牌爲主還是偏重推廣產品？

sentences.english: The right focuses obsessively on tax cuts, which have a similar effect.
sentences.chinese: 右派則偏重大幅削減稅費，同樣有着類似的效果。

sentences.english: The pre-occupation that is occurring is more orientated toward the physical skills of those past times.
sentences.chinese: 這種關注更偏重於過去時代的身體方面的技巧。

sentences.english: For example, you may find the above definition too technical.
sentences.chinese: 例如，您可能會認爲上述定義過於偏重於技術。

sentences.english: Khaki little too much weight, but very pretty.
sentences.chinese: 卡其色有點偏重，不過挺好看。

sentences.english: You want it to favor working storage.
sentences.chinese: 通常，您希望偏重於工作存儲。

sentences.english: Press the updown buttons to select either spot metering or enter-weighted average metering.
sentences.chinese: 按壓向上向下按鈕選擇符單點式或中央偏重測光。

sentences.english: The movable place over-emphasize place at the public welfare.
sentences.chinese: 活動場所偏重於公共福利性場所。
哲學家往往偏重於否定態度。

sentences.english: The economic loss caused by the typhoons is higher than the previous years.
sentences.chinese: 颱風造成的經濟損失較往年偏重。

definition: partial towards sth/to prefer/to incline/erroneous tendencies (Leftist or Revisionist deviation)
to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
to incline to/to prefer/to be prone to
to prefer/to be partial to sth/preference
to stress/to emphasize/particular about sth/to strive for
to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
to rely mainly on/to attach most importance to
